Text:
What are the 2 special files? Does this contain all 12 episodes?
http://tvrage.com/Whale_Wars/episode_list
The 2 eps missing: the first one is just a "best moments" episode. The second one is an interview with crew members, you can find it separately searching for "whale wars special 02"
and, yes, i guess it includes them both because in the description says it so o.O
I Cant wait for the new comming up season!! :D

Can someone upload the full DVD or HD tv-rip of this season? 350MB/ episode sucks, bad quality.
But thanks uploader for having this up anyway.
